entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dns.lookup.duration` metric for failed lookups #92837
  • Minor deficiency in value type unboxing codegen #92836
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add option to specify JsonNamingPolicy for enum serialization on JsonSourceGenerationOptions #92828
    Future
  • [maccatalyst] LLVM AOT build failure on iOS.Simulator.Aot-LLVM.Test #92827
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Deserialize Json Member as IAsyncEnumerable #92823
    Future
  • The JIT uses an redundant rbp register #92818
    9.0.0
  • bad JIT code generation in foreach loop #92809
    8.0.0
  • Request to backport JsonDocument thread safety fix to System.Text.Json v7 (PR#76716) #92808
    7.0.x
  • [8.0] File used by another process in Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #92805
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] 'RanToCompletion' failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #92804

Closed

  • Double.IsNegative returns true for Double.NaN #92834
  • Ping is not off by default in SocketsHttpHandler #92840
  • The compiler does not check that keys returned by the key selector passed to OrderBy are comparable #92691
  • `url.scheme` tag is emitted as part of `http.client.request.duration` metric that does not match the OTel spec #92077
  • Document NativeAOT diagnostics for the .NET8 release #88905
    8.0.0
  • QuicListener always listens on "ANY" endpoint ignoring QuicListenerOptions.ListenEndPoint config #92812
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'VN-based dead store removal' #91839
    9.0.0
  • Unable to deserialize JSON depicting object having list of properly attributed polymorphic base type or interface #92811
  • When a package has native assets for multiple rids the host ignores assets for base rids #92706
  • JIT: Failed ccmp recognition #92699
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Only emit pshufb when ssse3 is enabled. #92842
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Preinitialize pop/switch/Type.IsValueType #92841
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove fgUpdateFlowGraph from optOptimizeFlow #92839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw exception in TensorPrimitives for unsupported span overlaps #92838
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92832
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92831
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 'tracing' from Native AOT PR runs #92825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Call UpdateChangedFlowGraph after ifConversion #92821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92806
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Apply sequence equality comparison to the final Regex incremental value. #92835
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove `CompilationProvider` dependency from the source generator. #92833
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToSingle #92779
    area-System.Numerics
  • [tests][iOS] Fix iOS.Device.Aot.Test artifacts path #92783
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Always emit jump from hot finally block to cold target #92797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add stress mode for arm/arm64 function fragment splitting #92802
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Common.Tests.GetPrettyName_CannotRead_ReturnsNull test for root user #92695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow `key#value` for superpmi JIT option specification #92803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move variable scope tracking code #92800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize SequenceEqual to use ccmp on ARM64 #92810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable TensorPrimitives to perform in-place operations #92820
    area-System.Numerics
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf #92715
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement StoreVector64x2 and StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not nop-out SSA definitions in block morphing #92786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Supress policheck warning in blazor-sample #92711
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make effect handling in lowering less conservative #92710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #92731
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update `ryujit-overview.md` #92789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92794
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92796
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: fix self-conflicting HFA arg prolog handling for arm64 #92355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add plain Vector128 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #92680
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Update targetingpacks.targets #88991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use UnsafeAccessor in JSHostImplementation instead of reflection #92755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
